mapper.select: select id,name,tel,address,isDefault,updatedAt from address where account = #{account} order by isDefault desc, updatedAt desc limit 6;
mapper.update: update address set isDefault = 0 where account = #{account};
update address set name = #{name}, tel = #{tel}, address = #{address}, isDefault = #{isDefault} where account = #{account} and id = #{id};
mapper.delete: delete from address where account = #{account} and id = #{id} limit 1;
